content.rendered:
Hey everybody! Recently I have been working on making a video for the contest, Cardboard Edison: https://cardboardedison.com/award/. I submitted it today, and thought I’d just share it with you all as well!

I had a dilemma between putting it up on a new channel, or using my old channel that already has a small following. The dilemma is that my channel so far has been about Yu-Gi-Oh!, and so this is pretty much outside of what I would normally put on my channel. Then again, it’s been about 4 years since I have posted anything, and I might as well take advantage of it as I don’t really plan on making anymore Yu-Gi-Oh! videos. For now I set the video as unlisted to avoid either problem.

Anyway, this is completely unrelated, but I stumbled across this magician the other day and thought it was really amazing: https://youtu.be/0IlNpoTyjlw

I still can’t figure out how he did all those tricks.

That’s about all for now. What do you think of the Cardboard Edison submission video? Anything I could have done differently? Thanks for reading!

excerpt.rendered: Daggers High’s submission video to Cardboard Edison 2019.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Why you should submit to the Board Game Workshop Design Contest
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I've been working on Lord of Colors in my spare time for a while now, and since I don't currently have any long term plans with it, I figured I'd submit it to a contest to see how it does. I'm very interested to see what people have…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Response to Cardboard Edison Feedback
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In January I entered Daggers High into a contest called the Cardboard Edison Award. There were over 200 submissions, and 15 were selected as finalists. Unfortunately, Daggers High did not get selected this year, and if I am being honest I am pretty bummed about that. I get that there…

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Recently, I got a reminder to renew my website domain registration. That means that I have been working on building an audience for about a year now, and so today I thought I'd do an analysis of what has worked for me, and what has not. I will rate the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yearly Review (102nd post!)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! It's the 102nd post of this blog, which is absolutely mind-boggling to think about. That means that in the past year, I've been writing roughly 1 blog post for every 3 days! So today, I thought that I would share some of the statistics with you, which I…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Behind the Scenes: Animating Daggers High
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Today I released a video on my Youtube Channel for Daggers High. It's an animation that I created that is a how-to-play as well as a play-through of the game. https://youtu.be/hKCECFQkTUA Daggers High: an animation I'm still a newbie to creating animation.
